name: Droppy Blocky
description:
Droppy Blocky is a simple physics tower stacking game made for LD49.

Controls:
A / W: Move Left and Right
Space: Drop blocks

How to Play:
Grab blocks from the left and right sides of the screen. 
Drop them onto the platform and see how high you can stack 'em before the time runs out!

Music Credit:  www.bensound.com
